results.content:
The simple shopping cart section has saved this course. Unfortunately it is not up to date with the latest version of wordpress. 
The tutor wizzed over what theme he used. Missed it and used another that wasn't compatible with the course.

results.content: Providing students with good knowledge of wordpress ecommerce plugin. Quality course, no matter the course contents and the video recording. Highly recommended.
